services.title: Technology Services | AxonDigital - Advanced Development Capabilities
services.description: Our core technological capabilities: modern web development, AI integration, process automation, no-code platforms, and technical documentation. The foundation for industry-specific solutions.

hero.title: Our Technology Services
hero.description: Advanced technological capabilities that power industry-specific solutions. From modern development frameworks to AI integration and our proprietary TvorFlow Platform — these are the tools and methods we use to build exceptional digital products.
features: Modern Tech Stack
AI & Automation
Proven Methodologies

services.title: Modern Web Application Development
services.description: Full-stack development using React, Node.js, Next.js, and cloud technologies. We build scalable, secure applications with modern architecture patterns, API-first design, and DevOps practices for enterprise-grade performance.

services.title: High-Performance Website Development
services.description: Modern website development using Next.js, responsive design principles, and performance optimization techniques. We implement SEO-friendly architecture, progressive web app features, and content management systems for optimal user experience and search rankings.

services.title: Advanced AI Integration Technologies
services.description: Implementation of Large Language Models (LLMs), machine learning pipelines, and intelligent automation systems. We work with OpenAI API, vector databases, RAG architectures, and custom AI models to build intelligent systems that learn and adapt.

services.title: Intelligent Process Automation Technology
services.description: Automation systems using workflow engines, API integrations, robotic process automation (RPA), and event-driven architectures. We implement microservices, queue systems, and real-time processing to create self-managing business workflows.

services.title: TvorFlow Platform - Advanced No-Code Technology
services.description: Proprietary application generation platform with declarative configuration, automatic API generation, and dynamic UI rendering. Built on modern microservices architecture with multi-tenancy, role-based access control, and enterprise-grade scalability patterns.

services.title: Technical Architecture & Documentation
services.description: Comprehensive technical documentation methodology including system architecture design, API specifications, database schema planning, and development roadmaps. We use industry-standard documentation frameworks and architectural decision records (ADRs).

services.title: Technical Documentation Analysis & Optimization
services.description: Systematic analysis of technical documentation using established quality frameworks and best practices. We evaluate architecture consistency, API documentation completeness, code quality standards, and knowledge transfer effectiveness.

tvorflow-platform.title: TvorFlow Platform - No-Code Application Development | AxonDigital Services
tvorflow-platform.description: Our proprietary no-code platform that automatically generates enterprise-grade applications from data structure configurations. Deploy complex business applications 70% faster with built-in CRUD operations, admin panels, and multi-tenant architecture.

overview.title: TvorFlow Platform - No-Code Application Development
overview.description: Our proprietary no-code platform that automatically generates enterprise-grade applications from data structure configurations. Deploy complex business applications 70% faster with built-in CRUD operations, admin panels, and multi-tenant architecture.
overview.whenDoYouNeedIt: When you need to rapidly develop and deploy business applications without extensive coding. Perfect for data-driven applications, internal tools, customer portals, and enterprise systems that require quick time-to-market with professional-grade functionality.

whatsIncluded.title: Automated application generation
whatsIncluded.text: Define your data structures and automatically generate complete applications with CRUD operations, forms, and admin interfaces.

whatsIncluded.title: Multi-tenant architecture
whatsIncluded.text: Built-in support for multiple organizations, projects, and user groups with sophisticated access control and data isolation.

whatsIncluded.title: Enterprise-grade features
whatsIncluded.text: Automatic API generation, role-based permissions, audit logging, and scalable database architecture out of the box.

whatsIncluded.title: Custom business logic integration
whatsIncluded.text: Extend generated applications with custom workflows, integrations, and business-specific functionality.

whatsIncluded.title: Deployment and hosting setup
whatsIncluded.text: Complete deployment pipeline with hosting, SSL, monitoring, and backup systems configured for production use.

overview.result: A fully functional, production-ready application deployed in days instead of months. Includes all source code, documentation, hosting setup, and training. Reduces development costs by up to 70% while maintaining enterprise-grade quality and scalability.

spec-documentation.title: Project and Technical Documentation | AxonDigital Services
spec-documentation.description: We help you structure your digital product before development starts. You get detailed specifications, clear architecture, technology choices, and timelines — everything needed to plan, estimate, and launch development with confidence.

overview.title: Project and Technical Documentation
overview.description: We help you structure your digital product before development starts. You get detailed specifications, clear architecture, technology choices, and timelines — everything needed to plan, estimate, and launch development with confidence.
overview.whenDoYouNeedIt: When you're preparing to build a digital product and need well-structured, technically sound project documentation that reflects best engineering practices. This documentation becomes the foundation for estimating timelines and budgets, aligning all stakeholders, and ensuring your development team has a clear and actionable roadmap.

whatsIncluded.title: Understanding the product and goals
whatsIncluded.text: We start with interviews and goal analysis to define a sound product structure and scope.

whatsIncluded.title: System and process design
whatsIncluded.text: We design user flows, screen maps, and API structure. We define entities and business modules.

whatsIncluded.title: Tech stack and architecture choice
whatsIncluded.text: We select technologies and structure your app based on scalability, budget, and resources.

whatsIncluded.title: Development plan and milestones
whatsIncluded.text: You get a comprehensive project plan with clear phases, deliverables, and implementation timelines.

overview.result: You receive detailed documentation that serves as a blueprint for development. This includes technical specifications, user flows, architecture diagrams, and a structured development plan. The documentation helps minimize risks, avoid scope creep, and ensures everyone — developers, designers, and stakeholders — is aligned on the vision and execution strategy.

documentation-audit.title: Documentation Audit and Optimization | AxonDigital Services
documentation-audit.description: We analyze your existing project documentation to identify gaps, inconsistencies, and improvement opportunities. You get actionable recommendations to enhance clarity, completeness, and usability of your technical and project documentation.

overview.title: Documentation Audit and Optimization
overview.description: We analyze your existing project documentation to identify gaps, inconsistencies, and improvement opportunities. You get actionable recommendations to enhance clarity, completeness, and usability of your technical and project documentation.
overview.whenDoYouNeedIt: When you have existing documentation that feels incomplete, outdated, or difficult to navigate. Perfect for teams struggling with knowledge gaps, onboarding challenges, or development bottlenecks caused by unclear specifications.

whatsIncluded.title: Comprehensive documentation review
whatsIncluded.text: We analyze all existing docs: technical specs, user guides, API documentation, and process documents.

whatsIncluded.title: Gap analysis and recommendations
whatsIncluded.text: Identify missing information, outdated content, and areas where clarity can be improved.

whatsIncluded.title: Structure and organization optimization
whatsIncluded.text: Reorganize content for better navigation, searchability, and logical flow of information.

whatsIncluded.title: Implementation roadmap
whatsIncluded.text: Step-by-step plan for implementing improvements with priority levels and estimated effort.

overview.result: You receive a detailed audit report with specific recommendations, reorganized content structure, and a clear implementation plan. This leads to more efficient team collaboration, faster onboarding, reduced support requests, and smoother development processes.

platform.title: TvorFlow Platform - No-Code Data Management Solution | AxonDigital
platform.description: Our proprietary SaaS platform for automated application development. Configure data structures, generate CRUD APIs and admin panels automatically.

hero.title: TvorFlow Platform
hero.description: Our proprietary no-code platform that automatically generates enterprise-grade applications from data structure configurations. Deploy any application in days, not months, and reduce development costs by up to 70%.
features: Automatic API Generation
Multi-tenant Architecture
Zero-Code CRUD

capabilities.title: Revolutionary Approach to Application Development
capabilities.description: TvorFlow Platform eliminates the need for manual CRUD development, automatically generating APIs and admin interfaces from declarative configurations. This approach enables rapid deployment of any data-driven application — from simple management systems to complex enterprise solutions — reducing both time-to-market and development costs dramatically.

features.title: Automatic UI Generation
features.description: Admin panels, forms, tables, and validation are automatically generated based on entity definitions. No manual frontend development required.

features.title: Enterprise Multi-tenancy
features.description: Complete data isolation with Projects, Groups, and Facilities. Perfect for managing multiple organizations and departments.

features.title: Zero-Code Development
features.description: Define data structures through configuration, not code. The platform handles all CRUD operations, validation, and API endpoints.

architecture.title: Two-Tier Administration
architecture.description: TvorFlow Platform uses a sophisticated two-level administration system that scales from single applications to enterprise organizations.

levels.title: System Administration Panel
levels.description: Configure projects, data structures, categories, and global settings. Used by developers and system architects.

levels.title: Data Management Panel
levels.description: Manage actual data instances within specific organizations. Used by end-user administrators and content managers.

items.title: Entity Definition
items.description: Define data structures declaratively with fields, types, and relationships

items.title: Auto CRUD API
items.description: RESTful APIs generated automatically for all entities with full validation

items.title: Dynamic UI
items.description: Forms, tables, and pages generated based on entity configurations

items.title: Multi-language
items.description: Built-in internationalization support with dynamic language switching

items.title: Access Control
items.description: Role-based permissions with facility-level data isolation

items.title: Environment Management
items.description: Configurable variables for different deployment environments

items.title: Category System
items.description: Global attributes and categories for flexible data classification

items.title: Multi-tenant
items.description: Complete isolation with Projects, Groups, and Facilities hierarchy

useCases.title: Perfect For Enterprise Applications
useCases.description: TvorFlow Platform accelerates development of complex business applications across various industries and use cases.

features: Customer Management

expertise.description: Deep industry knowledge and real-world experience across fintech, healthcare, e-commerce, and enterprise sectors. We understand specific business challenges, regulations, and workflows that shape each industry.

hero.title: Industry Expertise & Domain Knowledge

features: Industry Experience
Domain Context

areas.title: Industry Experience & Domain Knowledge
areas.description: Real business experience and deep understanding of industry-specific challenges, regulations, and workflows

items.title: Fintech & Financial Services
items.description: Real-world experience with financial regulations, accounting standards, and payment processing. We understand PCI DSS compliance, KYC/AML requirements, and the complexities of multi-currency operations and financial reporting.

items.title: Healthcare & Medical Technology
items.description: Deep understanding of healthcare workflows, HIPAA compliance requirements, and medical data standards. Experience with clinical decision-making processes, patient privacy regulations, and integration with medical devices and lab systems.

items.title: E-commerce & Retail Technology
items.description: Understanding of retail business models, customer journey optimization, and omnichannel strategies. Experience with inventory management challenges, payment processing intricacies, and the complexities of marketplace operations and vendor relationships.

items.title: Enterprise & Corporate Solutions
items.description: Knowledge of corporate governance structures, approval hierarchies, and compliance requirements. Understanding of legacy system constraints, enterprise security policies, and the challenges of digital transformation in large organizations.

items.title: Education & Learning Platforms
items.description: Understanding of educational methodologies, student assessment frameworks, and institutional administrative processes. Experience with academic compliance requirements, learning outcome tracking, and educational technology integration challenges.

items.title: Real Estate & Property Technology
items.description: Knowledge of real estate market dynamics, property valuation factors, and legal documentation requirements. Understanding of buyer/seller journeys, agent workflows, and the complexities of property data management and verification.

cases.title: Fintech Payment Platform
cases.description: A fintech startup needed a secure payment processing platform with real-time transaction monitoring and compliance features. We built a comprehensive solution with multi-currency support and regulatory compliance.
cases.impact: Processed over $10M in transactions within first quarter, achieved PCI DSS compliance, and reduced transaction processing time by 50%.

cases.title: Healthcare Management System
cases.description: A medical clinic network required a unified system for patient records, appointment scheduling, and clinical workflows. We developed a HIPAA-compliant platform with telemedicine capabilities.
cases.impact: Improved patient satisfaction by 40%, reduced administrative overhead by 35%, and enabled remote consultations during pandemic.

cases.title: E-commerce Marketplace Platform
cases.description: A growing retailer needed a scalable e-commerce platform with advanced inventory management and customer analytics. We created a comprehensive solution with real-time reporting.
cases.impact: Increased online sales by 65%, improved inventory accuracy to 99.5%, and provided actionable customer insights that boosted conversion rates.

fintech-financial.title: Fintech & Financial Services | AxonDigital Expertise
fintech-financial.description: We develop applied financial solutions grounded in real-world use cases and deep expertise in accounting and business process automation.

overview.title: Fintech & Financial Services
overview.intro: We develop applied financial solutions grounded in real-world use cases and deep expertise in accounting and business process automation. Our accounting automation platform covers all core enterprise operations and can be used as a full system or modularly via API.
content: Automated accounting system with inventory and warehouse management, cash flow tracking, settlements with suppliers and customers, and multi-division accounting.
Automated generation of trial balances (TB) and account-based postings without manual input.
Comprehensive financial reporting, including balance sheets and profit & loss statements.
Flexible API enabling integration of individual modules into external systems and workflows.
Real-world use cases: warehouse and production integration on a fashion e-commerce site; full automation of accounting and CRM in an automotive service network.

healthcare-medtech.title: Healthcare & Medical Technology | AxonDigital Expertise
healthcare-medtech.description: We develop HIPAA-compliant healthcare solutions. Our focus is on building systems for clinics that center around patient care, treatment workflows, and secure medical documentation.

overview.title: Healthcare & Medical Technology
overview.intro: We develop HIPAA-compliant healthcare solutions. Our focus is on building systems for clinics that center around patient care, treatment workflows, and secure medical documentation.
content: Electronic medical records (EMR) with full patient history, attached documents, and visit summaries.
Appointment scheduling systems, integrated with physician calendars and automated reminders.
Physician-facing interfaces for recording structured visit notes, diagnoses, and prescribed treatment plans.
Automated generation of medical documents, including clinical notes, referrals, certificates, and discharge summaries.
Document workflow management, covering internal records and external document exchange related to patient treatment.
Integration with medical hardware, including lab systems and 3D printers for custom prosthetics.
End-to-end data security and full HIPAA compliance in system architecture, storage, and access control.

ecommerce-retail.title: E-commerce & Retail Technology | AxonDigital Expertise
ecommerce-retail.description: Our expertise lies in developing integrated e-commerce solutions that ensure a seamless buying experience for customers and provide store owners with simple, effective tools.

overview.title: E-commerce & Retail Technology
overview.intro: Our expertise lies in developing integrated e-commerce solutions that ensure a seamless buying experience for customers and provide store owners with simple, effective tools for managing products, stock, and analytics. We build both individual online stores and full-scale marketplaces with real-time inventory tracking and accounting system integrations.
content: User-friendly shopping interfaces that help customers easily find and purchase the products they need — search, filters, personalized recommendations, and streamlined checkout.
Product management dashboards for store owners: control over product cards, pricing, categories, photos, stock levels, and availability.
Support for both single-store and marketplace models, including multi-vendor architecture, commission tracking, and internal logistics tools.
Integration with internal accounting systems, enabling synchronization of sales data, stock movements, and inventory balance.
Analytics and reporting tools that track sales performance, inventory dynamics, top-performing products, and storefront efficiency.
Real-time inventory tracking, with automatic updates on sales, arrivals, and returns.

enterprise-corporate.title: Enterprise & Corporate Solutions | AxonDigital Expertise
enterprise-corporate.description: We develop corporate systems focused on automating key business processes and internal document workflows.

overview.title: Enterprise & Corporate Solutions
overview.intro: We develop corporate systems focused on automating key business processes and internal document workflows. Our solutions reduce manual overhead, improve control, and bring operational transparency to complex enterprise environments.
content: Corporate document workflow systems, with approval routing, status tracking, templates, e-signatures, and archiving.
Automation of specialized business processes, tailored to the company's internal structure: calculations, data validation, reporting, ledger generation, and more.
Interfaces for multiple roles and departments, with fine-grained access control, task-specific views, and audit logging.
Integration with existing IT infrastructure, using APIs or direct connections to internal databases and services.
Embedding new functionality into legacy systems through micro-frontend architecture — without the need for full UI rework.
Execution monitoring and reporting, with dashboards, SLA tracking, notifications, and process analytics.
Scalable architecture, ready to grow with your company and adapt to evolving internal workflows.

education-edtech.title: Education & Learning Platforms | AxonDigital Expertise
education-edtech.description: We develop educational technology solutions that enhance learning experiences, streamline administrative processes, and improve educational outcomes.

overview.title: Education & Learning Platforms
overview.intro: We develop educational technology solutions that enhance learning experiences, streamline administrative processes, and improve educational outcomes. Our platforms serve schools, universities, corporate training, and online education providers.
content: Learning Management Systems (LMS) with course creation, student progress tracking, assessment tools, and collaborative learning environments.
Student Information Systems with enrollment management, grade tracking, attendance monitoring, and parent-teacher communication portals.
Online course platforms with video streaming, interactive content, certification tracking, and payment processing for educational institutions.
Corporate training solutions with skills assessment, compliance training, performance tracking, and integration with HR management systems.
Educational analytics with learning outcome analysis, student performance prediction, curriculum optimization, and institutional reporting dashboards.

proptech-realestate.title: Real Estate & Property Technology | AxonDigital Expertise
proptech-realestate.description: We build real estate platforms focused on advanced property search, listing management, and custom business models.

overview.title: Real Estate & Property Technology
overview.intro: We build real estate platforms focused on advanced property search, listing management, and custom business models that define how clients, property owners, and platform operators interact. Our systems are designed for clarity, flexibility, and scale.
content: Property listing platforms with detailed parameters: price, location, size, property type, legal status, availability, and more.
Advanced filtering and search logic — covering everything from infrastructure and layout to floor level and documentation.
Map-based search and visualization, allowing users to explore listings geographically and evaluate proximity and infrastructure.
Owner dashboards with tools for managing listings, statuses, responses, and performance metrics.
Support for custom business models, including clearly separated roles for clients (buyers/renters), property owners, and platform operators (aggregators, agencies).
Scalable, high-performance architecture, fully adapted for mobile use and large property databases.

education-platform.title: Custom Education & Learning Platforms | AxonDigital Digital Solutions
education-platform.description: We develop flexible, custom-built learning platforms tailored to your specific needs, with features like course management, student progress tracking, assessments, and content analytics for online and blended education.

overview.title: Custom Education & Learning Platforms
overview.description: At AxonDigital, we specialize in developing modular and fully customized education platforms designed to meet the unique needs of your business. Whether you're a school, university, corporate trainer, or independent educator, we work with you to build a solution that includes only the features you need, ensuring a simple and effective platform for digitizing your educational offerings. Our expertise in EdTech allows us to create tailored solutions that grow with your business.
features: Modular course builder with lessons, video, assignments, and tests
Student dashboard with progress tracking, certifications, and learning paths
Teacher tools: grading, feedback, class management, communication
Assessment system with auto-checking, rubrics, and randomized testing
Content analytics and dropout prediction using learning data
Multi-role access control: admin, teacher, student, parent
Parental tools for monitoring student progress
Simplified B2C mode for independent educators
Support for micro-credentials and blockchain-based certification
Gamification elements to increase student engagement
architecture: Modular LMS backend with role-based content access, tailored to your requirements
Real-time event logging for learning behavior analytics, integrated with your systems
Cloud storage for multimedia lessons and test results, with scalability in mind
API layer for seamless integration with your existing HR, SIS, or payment systems
Scalable frontend for mobile-first and offline usage, designed for your users
SSO integration and compliance with GDPR/FERPA, ensuring security and privacy
technology: Frontend: React, Next.js with Tailwind and SSR, customized for your brand
Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, built for performance and scalability
Video: Mux/Vimeo API for content streaming, optimized for your content
AI/ML: LLM-powered tutor, quiz generator, dropout predictor, tailored to your needs
Security: OAuth2, RBAC, audit logs, ensuring your data is protected
Integrations: SCORM/LTI, payment gateways, corporate SSO, connected to your tools
useCases: Online school with structured courses and certification, built for your curriculum
Corporate learning management with internal analytics, aligned with your training goals
University platform for hybrid/blended learning delivery, integrated with your systems
Freelancer-led micro-learning platforms with payment features, designed for your audience
benefits: Get a fully customized platform built to your exact specifications
Reduce workload with automated assessments and analytics, tailored to your processes
Engage students with modern, tailored tools and features
Scale your solution as your business grows, with ongoing support
Monetize your content with flexible models like subscriptions or pay-per-course access

Listing management with moderation, access control, and media support

ElasticSearch layer for full-text and parametric property search
Modular CRM engine for agents and partners
Scalable micro-frontend system for partner customization
API-first backend for mobile and widget integrations
Cloud-based hosting with media CDN for photos and videos

Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL + PostGIS, Redis, ElasticSearch
Map Integration: Google Maps / Mapbox / OpenStreetMap
Search: ElasticSearch with custom ranking logic
Authentication: multi-role access, OAuth2, JWT
Hosting: Cloudflare CDN, AWS S3 for media, Docker for scalability

B2B platform for commercial properties and office space
Franchise model real estate portal with white-labeled partner areas
Private listing platform with document upload and buyer access control
benefits: Improve search UX and time-to-lead with high-performance filters
Offer differentiated value to agencies and sellers with built-in CRM
Support regional and multilingual growth with isolated partner zones
Monetize traffic with advanced listing tiers and lead sales
Integrate with 3rd-party services (mortgage, legal, analytics)

Payment processing with PCI DSS compliance and fraud detection
KYC/AML automation with document verification and risk scoring

Real-time financial dashboards with analytics and forecasting
API-first architecture for banking and third-party integrations

Secure payment gateway integration with tokenization and encryption
Real-time data pipelines for transaction monitoring and reporting

Telemedicine capabilities with video consultations and remote monitoring

Role-based access control with audit logging for all patient data access
Real-time data synchronization across multiple clinical locations
Secure API layer for medical device and lab system integration

Mobile-responsive design for healthcare professionals on-the-go

Database: PostgreSQL with audit trails and data versioning

oblikflow-en.title: OblikFlow - Accounting Automation Platform | AxonDigital Solutions
oblikflow-en.description: OblikFlow is an intelligent platform for managing bookkeeping, tax reporting, and financial documents. Designed for accounting firms serving multiple clients, it enables seamless data collection, document processing, and tax compliance through AI and automation.

overview.title: OblikFlow — Client-Centric Accounting Automation
overview.description: OblikFlow is an intelligent platform for managing bookkeeping, tax reporting, and financial documents. Designed for accounting firms serving multiple clients, it enables seamless data collection, document processing, and tax compliance through AI and automation.
features: Multi-client management with access control
AI-powered document recognition and processing
Automated accounting entries and validation
Comprehensive tax calculation and reporting
Client portal for document upload and communication
Integration with banks and tax portals
architecture: Client Management: multi-profile support with access control and taxation settings.
Client Portal: upload documents, view reports, communicate with accountants.
Staff Dashboard: manage clients, generate reports, calculate taxes and salaries.
Document Upload & Parsing: via web, email, API, Excel templates. AI extracts document structure.
Posting & Validation: automatic accounting entries with rule-based validation.
Tax Calculation Module: supports different regimes, periods, and currencies.
Payroll Module: salary by performance, rates, or sales. Integrated with bank exports.
Inventory Management: product receipts, write-offs, inter-project movement, FX revaluation.
Reporting: balance sheets, profit/loss, tax filings, VAT, social taxes, dividend tax.
Analytics & Dashboards: trends, forecasts, obligations, project-level metrics.
Tax Optimization Suggestions: legal AI-based advice to reduce tax load.
Integration Layer: sync with CRM, ERP, banks, tax portals via API.
Task Management: assign and track bookkeeping tasks.
Security & Compliance: full audit log, GDPR compliance, role-based access.
technology: OCR + Layout Parsing: for scanned and structured documents.
GPT-4 Turbo + Finetuned Rules: for document classification and extraction.
MongoDB + Node.js: core ledger and data processing engine.
Cloud-first architecture: supports horizontal scaling and multi-tenancy.
Secure RESTful API: for external integrations and file exchange.
useCases: A firm manages 150+ clients: documents flow in via web/email/API.
Invoices and receipts are recognized and auto-posted to journals.
Accountants validate data and send tax reports directly from OblikFlow.
Clients track tax obligations and financial performance in the portal.
System suggests optimized expense handling to reduce tax liability.
benefits: Reduce manual data entry by 80%
Automate tax calculations and compliance
Improve client communication and transparency
Scale accounting operations efficiently
Minimize errors through AI validation

oblikflow-ua.title: ОблікФлоу - Платформа автоматизації бухгалтерії | Рішення AxonDigital
oblikflow-ua.description: ОблікФлоу  — це інтелектуальна система для ведення бухгалтерії, податкової звітності та обробки первинних документів. Розроблена для компаній, які обслуговують кількох клієнтів одночасно. Забезпечує повний цикл — від завантаження документів до формування звітів.

overview.title: ОблікФлоу  — Автоматизація обліку для бухгалтерських фірм
overview.description: ОблікФлоу  — це інтелектуальна система для ведення бухгалтерії, податкової звітності та обробки первинних документів. Розроблена для компаній, які обслуговують кількох клієнтів одночасно. Забезпечує повний цикл — від завантаження документів до формування звітів.
features: Управління декількома клієнтами з контролем доступу
AI-розпізнавання та обробка документів
Автоматичні бухгалтерські проводки та валідація
Комплексні податкові розрахунки та звітність
Клієнтський портал для завантаження документів
Інтеграція з банками та податковими порталами
architecture: Управління клієнтами: підтримка декількох профілів, доступи, податкові режими.
Клієнтський портал: завантаження документів, перегляд звітів, спілкування з бухгалтером.
Панель співробітника: управління клієнтами, нарахування ЗП, обробка документів.
Завантаження документів: через веб, email, API або шаблони Excel. AI проводить розпізнавання.
Обробка та проводки: автоматичне створення записів згідно з правилами обліку.
Податковий модуль: підтримка УСН, ОСН, самозайнятих, валют і періодів.
Модуль зарплати: нарахування по ставці, виручці або відпрацьованому часу.
Управління складом: прихід, списання, переміщення між проєктами, курсові різниці.
Звіти: баланс, прибутки/збитки, декларації з ПДВ, ЄСВ, податок на дивіденди.
Аналітика: динаміка, прогнози, зобов'язання, дохідність проєктів.
Оптимізація податків: AI-рекомендації з легального зниження податкового навантаження.
Інтеграція: з CRM, ERP, банками, податковими порталами через API.
Менеджмент задач: постановка завдань, нагадування, статуси.
Безпека та комплаєнс: повний журнал дій, GDPR-сумісність, контроль доступу.
technology: OCR + розбір структури: для сканів та електронних документів.
GPT-4 Turbo + бізнес-правила: для класифікації та витягання даних.
MongoDB + Node.js: ядро обробки та збереження даних.
Хмарна архітектура: масштабування, ізоляція клієнтів, безперебійність.
RESTful API: безпечний обмін файлами та даними з зовнішніми системами.
useCases: Бухгалтерська компанія обслуговує 150+ клієнтів через один інтерфейс.
Документи надходять через портал, email або API й автоматично обробляються.
Бухгалтер перевіряє дані, підписує декларації та відправляє їх.
Клієнт бачить фінансову картину та податкові зобов'язання в реальному часі.
Система пропонує рекомендації щодо оптимізації витрат для зниження податків.
benefits: Скорочення ручного введення даних на 80%
Автоматизація податкових розрахунків та комплаєнсу
Покращення комунікації та прозорості з клієнтами
Ефективне масштабування бухгалтерських операцій
Мінімізація помилок через AI-валідацію

publicOffer.title: Public Offer | AxonDigital - Terms of Service
publicOffer.description: Public offer and terms of service for AxonDigital digital agency services, including AI assistant usage, data processing, and liability limitations.

content.title: 1. General Provisions
content.text: This document is a public offer (proposal) of AxonDigital (hereinafter referred to as the "Provider") for the provision of information services on the website.

content.title: 2. Subject of the Offer
content.text: The Provider grants the User access to information materials and services available on the website, including AI assistant for collecting information and creating briefs.

content.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
content.text: All information provided on the website, including information generated by the AI assistant, is for informational purposes only. The Provider assumes no responsibility for decisions made by the User based on the information received.

content.title: 4. Use of AI Assistant
content.text: The AI assistant is designed to help create briefs and collect information. Responses generated by the AI assistant are automatically formed based on data provided by the User and do not constitute professional advice.

content.title: 5. Confidentiality
content.text: The Provider undertakes not to disclose information received from the User, except in cases provided for by law. However, the Provider cannot guarantee complete security of data transmission over the Internet.

content.title: 6. Final Provisions
content.text: This offer is valid indefinitely. The Provider reserves the right to make changes to the terms of the offer at any time without prior notice to the User. Continued use of the website after changes are made indicates the User's agreement with the new terms.
